entries.femaleVariant: Listen up. Other day… heard some chrome jock preachin' to high heaven ‘bout Kurt Hansen. Praisin' ‘im for the protection he extends over all those seeking refuge in Dogtown.
Well… can somebody please tell me – if we're all so damn "protected," why the hell’re Scavs prowlin’ the area, huh?
Can anyone feel safe when folks disappear every day? Only then to wind up as chum in a slop bucket?
Yeah. Protection? My ass.
Listen, folks. I'mma try my best-EST to keep a sharp eye on things for ya. But I gotta be straight with you – I can't possibly do it alone.
Soooo, I’ve set up a site – growlfm.web.
After confirming the intel, of course. I mean, this ain't the fuckin' Network News…
So, of all the peeps knockin' about these parts, not too many don't have questionable pasts.
But check this — our pasts don't define us. Who we are right now, what we strive to become – that's what matters.
History’s history, folks – you can't change yours, it’s locked in, hard coded.  But you sure as hell can forge your future...
Got a biggie to ask you today. Fate – do we control it, or do we wear its leash around our necks? Been thinkin' about this lately, a lot...
Growin' up, I actually liked the idea of a path, ordained, predetermined  – my future set in stone. Something comforting about that…
These days? The very notion of having no control over my destiny just rubs me wrong.
And on GROWL FM, we're all about accountability. But what do you think? Fate – does it rate with you? Or is it a load of bunk?
Drop us a line, lemme know. You know where – growlfm.web.
Biotechnica chemical spill of '73 – buzzers goin’ off?
No? Well, join the crowd. See, officially, it’s not a thing. No reports. Zero coverage. Zip. Nada.
But believe you me, chooms, it happened – and as sure as shit it stinks. See, I was there. because, well, there… was here: Pacifica.
‘Cause, I mean, how can any of us be held accountable for what we do if we don't truly own the choices we make?
See anything sus, anything you feel we all need to know about ASAP, zip me the detes pronto and I will get the word out!
Whole lotta peeps close to me suffered real bad 'cause of it. Third degree burns, blindness, birth defects, the whole shebang.
But the media, that fucking fifth estate, turned a blind eye. Corpo cunts paid 'em all off.
Sad as it is, there ain't a media or journo in Night City who wouldn't sell their soul for some extra scratch, even if them eddies come spattered with blood.
Truth be told – makes me fuckin' sick.
Talkin' "change" today, folks. The positive kind. Doesn't happen often, but when it does, it usually comes after shit’s hit the fan.
That's the way I see it, anyway. See, humans are conservative creatures by nature – tend not to do anything even mildly uncomfortable unless they really have to.
Even if it's good for 'em! Hell, some have to hit rock bottom to get their shit together and even try to make a difference.
And that's just change on a personal level. Wanna go bigger, make a positive impact on society? It’s gonna take more than words, more than actions, even.
That requires a a grand fuckin' gesture. Like, say, burying an axe in the heads of three Tyger Claws for rapin' and killin' one of your dolls, à la Lizzie Borden.
Now that was some statement! Sure, bastards killed her for it, but that just sealed the deal.
Damage was done, fuse was lit. And oh boy did that bomb go off!
We rioted right across Night City, formed the Mox, and it all became a symbol of somethin' uber important. Countless lives’ve been made better ever since.
Positive change, folks. 'Cause small gestures don't get squat done.
We've all heard the tired, old rhetoric by now: "Only scopbags settle in Dogtown. End up there, and you probably deserve whatever sordid fate comes your way."
First spewed out by the media, then regurgitated by skullsponge potatoes void of a single original thought.
Know why? 'Cause shittin' on us makes the rest of Night City seem more attractive. Keeps folks content and feelin’ superior.
"Oh, shit's bad, honey, I know! But hey, least we ain't in Dogtown."
Same shit as always, ain't it.
Baloney, chooms. Baloney to bait people into stayin' put.
And yeah, this place has its drawbacks, I know - a lotta them for damn sure. But come the end of the day, it's the price we pay for a sliver of freedom.
'N’ I'll pay it every damn time.
You know how they say you shouldn't eat shitty food 'fore goin’ to bed? Things like scop cheese. Pop-Turds, or Tofu’d Tuna…
Well, go ahead 'n’ add Banana Butter Bears to the list. Snarfed a whole pack before lights out last night.
Ended up havin' the craziest dreams - and no, not the Lizzy Wizzy wet 'n’ wild type neither. Talkin' piss-your-pants-wake-up-in-a-cold-sweat crazy.
So anyway, there I was, ass deep in the land of nod, and I'm runnin' naked through wet streets. I’m in Pacifica, and bein' chased by a horde of Night Citizens.
But here's where the sitch gets surreal: I look back 'n’ they're all wearin’ my face. Super realistic masks of me. Uncanny. 'Cept none of ‘em got any eyes.
And the final fuckery? I catch sight of my reflection in a shop window and, get this, ain't got no face at all.
Just bloody tissue and big, lidless eyes starin' back. Freaked me the fuck out.
So, any oneirocritics out there ~ wanna shed some light on this shitshow of a dream? Get in touch - I'm hella curious.
Hearin' a lotta chatter about Devolutionism and Federalism lately.
Free state autonomy versus a united nation under a central government. Pros 'n’ cons of both sides, that sorta thing.
So I decided to ask you, my listeners – what do you think? Who do you stand with, if anyone?
And I know some of you’re screamin' at your boomboxes right now: "Who the hell cares!?" Right?
And yeah, yeah, I hear ya. Neutrality is a pretty attractive stance to take - an apathetic mind bein’ a peaceful mind ‘n’ all.
But this all reminded me of a story my daddy used to tell me way, way back.
Gonna share it with you right now:  Once upon a time there was a donkey who didn't know what to do. So the donkey was just standin' around in its barn, feelin' pretty damn hungry.
Luckily, there was a bale of hay not too far off, at one end of the barn. All's good, right? Not exactly. 'Cause the donkey was just as thirsty.
It spotted a watering trough at the other end of the barn. And here's the kicker: the bale and trough were the same distance away, opposite ends of the barn.
So, the dilemma – "which one first?" The donkey pondered.  Hay or water? Water or hay? The donkey just couldn't decide.
Eventually, unable to make up its mind, the donkey died of both hunger AND thirst. RIP Donkey, my choomba.
Now, the detes might not hold up under logical scrutiny but that's beside the point. Moral is: don't dilly-dally.
Find yourself teetering, facing a dilemma? Just make a goddamn choice. Before it's too late.
Now, here's a little somethin’ to settle you in.
All right. Catch y'all again, right after this.
Up next: another fresh find, especially for you.
Right, chooms. As requested, here's another Growl Fm original. Enjoy.
Now for some more music, see if we can get the vibe just right. I know a lotta you need it.
Well, suppose it’s time for some more music. All right, here we go.
Cravin’ another fix of fresh finds? Here's another batch.
Kick back 'n’ crank it to the max, chooms, Here's some more tunes.
Y'all want more music? Ash's got ya covered!
Y'all want more music? Ash's got ya covered!
More from me, right after these.
Okay, folks, here's another treat or two, beats for y'all.
Wanna hit the streets with some background beats? Here you go, choombas!
OK, plot thickens, looks like. Not only is Kurt lettin’ scavs prowl the area – which, let's face it, is pretty shitty of ‘im whichever way you cut it.
He's playing host to some of them, now?! Honestly can't even shoot a guess at what that's about.
Jeez, never thought that scumbag could sink so low. But there you have it.
Best prep yourselves, folks. My senses are tingling, so shitstorm’s clearly inbound.
Barghest bastards’re runnin’ around, sniffin’ in all the nooks and crannies. Somethin's got ‘em excited.
Prolly best to give 'em a wide berth for now, least till we know what the hell’s givin’ ‘em a hard-on.
Heard Kurt's PSAs lately? He's really blarin' out the agitprop. About how "Corps aren't welcome in Dogtown." Hah!
Know the reason for that song 'n’ dance? He doesn't want peeps seein' him 'n’ them side by side. If they did, I mean, they might just see some similarities.
Y'know, merciless outfits who put the pursuit of profit and power above all else? Yeah, same coin, different side.
Soz, Kurt, the jig is up - we all know what you are.
Barghest boneheads’re at it again, folks! Flatlined a rando on the east side this morning. In broad daylight, no less.
Didn't even attempt to make it discrete. Brazen bastards said it was a "rightful killing"; claimed the guy was an undercover badge snoopin' around their turf, gatherin' intel.
Jesus, this ain't no Shadow War, dammit – with spies scurryin' all over the shop, sabotaging this 'n’ that. Kurt.
I swear this guy's growin’ more paranoid by the day. Mark my words, this won’t end well.
Nova news, folks! Station's gainin' a heap of traction. Reachin' way more of you than ever before – no! More than I ever thought possible.
Even spotted a few Growl FM tags scattered around town. Real preem, my chooms. Made my day seein' 'em, truly did!
Now… let's keep this train rollin’!
Why Dogtown – get asked that a LOT! Why not set up shop elsewhere?
So, some of ya might know this, but Dogtown has a very special place in my heart. See, found myself at a real low point once, and what I found here was… family.
They helped me get back on my feet, put myself back together. Showed me that even in the darkest times, there's light to be found.
And hell, who has it darker than Dogtown?
Ya see, that’s why I’m here, tryin' my damndest to be a speck of light in Night City’s deepest shadowland. And yeaaah, pirate radio might not be much, but, hey, it's what I've got to give.
And at the end of the day, all we really are is what we can give of ourselves.
Y'all seen the AVs dumpin' shit over Dogtown? Kurt's airdrops – that’s what’s goin’ on there.
Gifts aplenty for the Golden God hisself, though also a preem chance to nab some extra loot, if you’re feelin' bold.
But watch out for those heavy bastards – they can come tumblin' outta the blue, catch you by surprise.
Actually heard about one with faulty thrusters the other week; pancaked a merc on landin’. Meat 'n’ chrome to soup 'n’ sparks in the blink of an eye.
Tragic irony's that the thing was carryin' medical supplies. Sheesh, what a way to go…
Cooooolossal news, folks. Space Force One has been downed in Dogtown.
President Myers is said to’ve been on board, but at the mo' that's pure speculation.
No other intel just yet as, yup, you guessed it, Barghest have locked down the crash site. So, yeah…
Shit, never thought I'd be announcing somethin' like this. Stay tuned: you'll know more soon as we know more.
Space Force One bein' shot down in Dogtown - indubitably, it's news, it's BIG news.
But there's more to it than that, chooms, it’s lots itchier, if you know what I mean.
It highlights a major concern. If – dare I say it? – it was a purposeful act of aggression, what’s that mean for us?
Are we facing an imminent invasion? Is this the spark for another civil war in NC?
Sheesh, got so many "what if's" rattlin' around my brain I could amuse a newborn.
How about you folks help me out - lemme know what you think happened, what you think’s gonna happen.
Scary times, folks, I know. But we'll get through ‘em - we always do!
The swirlin’ rumors now stand confirmed, chooms. Rosalind Myers was indeed in Dogtown. Imagine that!
But-but-but… those hopin’ for a meet-'n'-greet with the President of the New United States of America’ll have to take a raincheck.
Seems Rosey’s back in Washington, safe and sound.
Wanna hear somethin' funny? Kurt now claims she was never here in the first place.
What?! Huh!? Ain't that a thing! Seems a certain someone’s butthurt over the president sidesteppin’ his li’l lockdown.
Poor Kurt. Buy hey, can't win 'em all, can you.
Got a lotta hustle 'n’ bustle ‘round the Black Sapphire today.
Small parade of luxury AVs, limos, the works. Looks like our resident warlord is plannin' something big.
I'd steer clear if I was you. Nothin' good ever comes of that cockroach and his cronies convenin’ to conspire.
No point pokin’ at the hornets' nest.
Y'all heard? About Kurt's freshly imposed "State of Emergency"?
Yeah, as if that ain't the status quo for Dogtown as-is, am I right?
Seems like something's ruffled the old coot's feathers - and, gotta tell ya, folks, I love hearin’ him squawk.
Stay alert. Kurt's goons are on the move. A lotta patrolin', random searches, shooting going on all over the shop.
Hell, they've even gone to the extent of lockin' down Dogtown. "No one in, no one out."
Seems Kurt just went ahead and promoted himself to Prison Warden - yeah, I know, big surprise, big diff, right?
Dogtown's still on lockdown, folks. Kurt continues to blast announcement after announcement outta his ass.
Barghest patrols’re everywhere, raids happenin’ all over town. Firefights break out literally every other second.
I mean, jeez, it's always been bad, but at this rate gunfire is gonna become part of the natural fuckin' soundscape.
Stay safe, and keep your heads down, chooms, catchin' a stray slug is never fun.
Oh, boy, do I have news for you! It's a biggie so lemme just cut to the punch.
Colonel Kurt Hansen is dead. Shot to shit at the stadium, so the rumor goes. Live by iron, die by iron, right?
And you know what? I hope that sonuvabitch went down screamin’, I really do.
It's a damn good day in Dogtown, my chooms. Savor it!
Barghest is under new leadership. Some guy named Bennett claims to have stepped up as Dogtown’s overlord.
Let's see just how big the bone in this bozo's head is. Gonna go out on a limb and say prolly pretty damn big.
And no, that’s no compliment.
Colonel Kurt Hansen has been officially replaced.
In light of him bein' dead 'n' all. Can't imagine this as particularly good news.
Barghest is a dark cloud over Dogtown and every day they go on prowling is another day we gotta wait to see the sun.
Still, this new fella can't be any worse than Kurt, right? Right?!
OK, so ‘member all the hullabaloo about scavs? Well, guess what?
Disappearances are down. Like, way down! Seems they decided to relocate. Or somethin' scared 'em off.
Or better yet, maybe someone sent some sweet justice their way. As I see it, doe’n’t matter much.
Point is, streets around here just got a little safer, and that's somethin’ to celebrate.
All rightie, pretty important PSA comin’ your way. Well, for some, at least.
Got numerous reports comin' in about malfunctions appearin’ in… Mr. Studds. And yeah, it’s the "hot, melted junk" kinda malfunction.
So unless, for whatever reason, you're into scorched sausage, I'd hold off on upgrading your kit till they iron out the kinks.
If you’re thinkin’ "Hey, Ash sounds a little off today," well, you’re likely not wrong, chooms.
I feel… deflated, droopy, just plain down, Ah, got wind of some bad news.
Found out a friend of mine, a dear friend, died.
Yeah. Took her own life after some fucked up shit happened to her.
Y'know, she wanted to be an actress, pursued it… relentlessly. That was her true passion. It was her dream.
But this city, it chews up dreams and spits out nightmares, every goddamn day.
And you know what? We accept it 'cause it's the norm. But, my chooms, it doesn't have to be.
Anyway, just wanted to share a few thoughts about a friend. Thanks for listening.
Got some nova news today for… all the adrenaline junkies out there feelin' the need for speed.
Though she's stood as a stationary beast for quite some time, the 'coaster over at Eden Beach is, somehow, back up 'n’ runnin’.
Yeah, no idea how or why, but there she goes, chooms, a-rollin' 'n’ a-rattlin' ‘round its circuit.
Prolly missed a maintenance check or two over the years, but hey, the lingering threat of severe injury and/or death just heightens the thrill, am I right?
My chooms, Saburo Arasaka is dead. Whispers on the wind are sayin’ "foul play.”
Considering the news came alongside reports of a shootout at Konpeki Plaza, the hotel there, I'd wager those whispers aren't too shy of certainty.
Might snoop around some, see if I can confirm one way or the other.
'Cause it's not every day that a titan falls, folks. Especially one as big as Saburo. Just a shame the old man's legacy ain't as easy to topple.
So today we're speculating: Who dunnit? Who killed Saburo Arasaka? And why?
Hell, the bag o' bones had a list of enemies longer than a Studd XL, right? Coulda been anyone.
But you gotta ask the big question, folks: cui bono – or who benefited most from the Emperor's death?
Figure that out, and I'd wager you identified the perp.
So, who's your money on? Maybe you got a fun theory? Lemme know.
PSA time again, chooms. Clouds, the dollhouse over in Japantown, has closed its doors shut until further notice.
The cause? Some sorta turf war left the place shot to shit.
Gotta say, it's a real shame - Clouds was the best hands down. Clients'll be hard pressed to find something that scratches the same itch.
But that's the way she goes, folks, 'specially in this city. It destroys everything eventually, inside 'n’ out, body 'n’ mind.
It's the way she fuckin' goes…
PSA time again, chooms. Clouds, the dollhouse over in Japantown, is under new management.
Word is, a former doll has grabbed the reins, and that can only be good news, right?
If any of you plan on checkin' out the new setup, drop us a line and let us know how things are goin’ over there.
I, for one, am real curious.
Might’ve heard this already, but apparently there's been a big ol' ruckus over at the GIM, AKA the Grand Imperial Mall.
Seems a certain pack of Animals got a taste of their own testosterone-laced medicine.
Word is, entire crew was outdone by, get this, a lone wolf - yup, a solitary punk took down all those brutes.
Can’t help laughin’ when I imagine it!
Oversized gonks'll be lickin' their wounds for a time, I'd wager, 'cause no amount of augmentation can edit away the pain of that level of embarrassment!
